name: Chaos Theory in the Octobear Jam
name_original: Chaos Theory in the Octobear Jam
description:
Chaos Theory in the Octobear Jam is an adventure-platformer game developed by GamedevKlingon. It came out on 19-10-2018.
You can play Chaos Theory in the Octobear Jam on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
